meta.title: Get All Widget Templates - Widget Template - Widgets - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a list of Widget Templates.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: ...

blocks.data:
### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Content | modify | `store_v2_content` |
|  Content | read-only | `store_v2_content_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

page.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

limit.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

schema.description: The schema for the widget's merchant-facing UI. For more information on the available schema settings, see [Widget UI Schema](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/stencil-docs/page-builder/widget-ui-schema).

anyOf.title: widgetSchemaTab
anyOf.description: **Tab.** Use the **tab** settings type to create settings visible in Page Builder.

type.description: The type of setting component to display.

label.description: The user-friendly message to inform the user how this setting will be used.
The user-friendly message to inform the user how this setting will be used.

settings.description: For examples of schema settings, see [Widget UI Input Types](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/stencil-docs/page-builder/schema-settings).

items.title: widgetSchemaSetting_Base
items.description: For examples of each type of setting, see [Page Builder > Schema Settings](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/stencil-docs/page-builder/schema-settings/alignment) in Theme Docs.

type.description:
The type of setting component to display. You can view the list of elements below to discover which are available to use.

For examples of each type of setting, see [Page Builder > Schema Settings](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/stencil-docs/page-builder/schema-settings/alignment) in Theme Docs.

label.description: The user friendly message to inform the user how this setting will be used.

id.description: The variable name where the setting value will be available in the widget template.

default.description: The default value to use when rendering the widget for the first time. Make sure to set sensible defaults to make your widget easier to use.

typeMeta.description: Additional information needed based on the selected setting type.

conditional.title: widgetSchemaConditional
conditional.description: An optional property that can be added to each setting to control whether it should be displayed to the user while editing in Page Builder. This does not clear the value in the setting, just controls the display of the setting.

key.description: The ID of the `setting` object the conditional attribute is related to.

operator.description: Specifies the operation used to determine whether to display the setting. The `IN` operator is currently the only supported operator. The setting will be displayed if the conditional’s `value` property is equal to the selected value of the `selectOptions`.

value.description: A single-object array containing a value from the `typeMeta`'s `selectOptions`.

anyOf.title: widgetSchemaArray
anyOf.description: **Array.** Use the **array** settings type to build collections of elements within the widget. Each element in the array can contain tabs, sections, and an entire schema.

defaultCount.description: number of elements in the list to display by default.

entryLabel.description: name for each element in the list

thumbnail.description: used to display an image stored at the specified attribute name

schema.description: The schema used for each element in the array.

anyOf.title: widgetSchemaHidden
anyOf.description: **Hidden.** Use the **hidden** settings type to create controls that have no user interface drawn in Page Builder. Hidden settings are not grouped into any other tabs or arrays.

template.description: The widget template HTML. Supports Handlebars and Paper helpers.

storefront_api_query.description: The GraphQL Storefront API query that provides widget data.

date_created.description: The date on which this object was initially created.

date_modified.description: The date on which this object was last updated.

current_version_uuid.description: The identifier to the current version of this widget template.

icon_name.description: A read-only value. Do not attempt to set or modify this value in a POST or PUT operation.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
